title: "First test of self-driving trucks to hit CityLink on Friday"
excerpt: "A self-driving truck will be trialled on CityLink for the first time on Australian roads in a glimpse at the future of freight transport. A safety driver will be on-board the large vehicle at all times, and will only take control of the wheel if required."
